practice_phrases.target: I am nearly ready to go
I guess I am nearly ready
I am nearly ready to learn
I am nearly ready to say
I am nearly ready to start

practice_phrases.known: 我快准备好要回答你的问题了
practice_phrases.target: I am nearly ready to answer

practice_phrases.known: 我感觉好像我快准备好要说英语了
practice_phrases.target: I feel as if I am nearly ready to speak English

practice_phrases.known: 我快准备好了，但我想在我走之前练习说话
practice_phrases.target: I am nearly ready, but I want to practise speaking before I go

practice_phrases.known: 我很喜欢感觉好像我快准备好要帮别人学习英语了
practice_phrases.target: I like feeling as if I am nearly ready to help people learn English
